events.message: The customer reported an auto accident that occurred on the morning of May 1st involving their car and another vehicle at a busy intersection.
After initial review, the claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a collision between two personal vehicles.
An agent with expertise in vehicle collision claims was assigned to handle the case and support the customer throughout the process.
The claim acknowledgment message was sent to the customer confirming receipt and promising timely follow-up on the auto accident claim.
The agent requested relevant documents such as the police report, photos of vehicle damages, and the other driver’s insurance details.
The customer promptly submitted all requested documents including accident photos, the police report, and the repair estimate from the authorized dealer.
An investigation was initiated to verify the circumstances of the auto accident and to assess liability and damage extent.
The accident investigation was completed confirming the customer’s liability and validating the submitted damage reports and bills.
A settlement offer covering the repair costs and associated expenses was proposed to the customer for review and approval.
The customer responded positively to the settlement proposal expressing satisfaction with the promptness and fairness of the offer.
Following the customer’s acceptance, the auto accident claim was approved and prepared for payment disbursement.
Payment covering the repair expenses and other agreed-upon costs was issued successfully to the customer’s bank account.
The claim was officially closed after confirming the customer received payment and expressed satisfaction with the claim handling.
All relevant documents and correspondence for the auto accident claim were archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
